senses.sense_definition: The production and release of a substance, such as a hormone or fluid, in amounts that are higher than normal.

examples.text: The doctor explained that the <w>oversecretion</w> of acid in the stomach was the primary cause of the patient's discomfort.
Certain tumors can trigger an <w>oversecretion</w> of hormones, leading to significant metabolic changes in the body.
